lead_paragraph: TENENBAUM--Gerald, of Manhattan and Milford, PA, died on March 18 at the age of 82. Jerry was an electrical engineer, a graduate of Stuyvesant High School and City College of New York. He earned a Masters Degree in Computer Science and an MBA. A vigorous, energetic man, after retiring Jerry used the management skills he developed to serve as Board President and Acting General Manager of the 960 apartment cooperative where he lived with Sydney Weinberg, his wife of 20 years. Jerry was a voracious reader, an enthusiastic traveler, a happy sailor, and brave enough to test his mettle at painting, writing, and music after his engineering career. He is survived by his wife Sydney, his brother Allen and wife Bryna, his children and their spouses: Craig and Joanne Tenenbaum; Meryl and John Cassidy; Helene and Joe Fox; grandchildren Scott, Sean, Josh and Stephanie; great- grandchild Zoe, and stepdaughters Deborah and Elisa. 1/3
